original_text: You have stored silver and gold coins to spend for yourselves. But dirt has spoiled those coins. That dirt will show that you are guilty. It will become like fire that is burning your bodies. In the last days of this world you have stored all this money for yourselves.
korean_text: 너희 금과 은은 녹이 슬었으니 이 녹이 너희에게 증거가 되며 불 같이 너희 살을 먹으리라 너희가 말세에 재물을 쌓았도다

sentences.original_text: You have stored silver and gold coins
But dirt has spoiled those coins
That dirt will show that you are guilty
sentences.korean_translation: 그 흙은 너희가 유죄임을 보여줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: In the last days of this world
you have stored all this money for yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이 모든 돈을 너희 자신을 위해 저장했다
